brand_identity.name: ARAR Parfums
brand_identity.tagline_secondary: A presence you do not announce. A memory that remains.

headings.usage: All section titles, hero text, product names. Use tracking-tight (-0.02em) for larger sizes.

body.usage: Descriptions, navigation, functional text. Use tracking-wide (0.05em) for small caps labels.

buttons.primary: bg-transparent text-linen border border-bronze/40 px-8 py-4 hover:bg-bronze hover:text-charcoal transition-colors duration-500 uppercase tracking-widest text-xs font-medium rounded-none
buttons.secondary: text-bronze underline decoration-bronze/30 underline-offset-8 hover:decoration-bronze transition-all duration-500 uppercase tracking-widest text-xs
buttons.text: text-linen/70 hover:text-linen transition-colors duration-300 uppercase tracking-widest text-xs

cards.style: bg-transparent border border-white/5 hover:border-bronze/30 transition-colors duration-700 p-8 or p-12
cards.image_style: aspect-[3/4] object-cover filter brightness-[0.8] contrast-[1.1] grayscale-[0.2]

inputs.style: bg-transparent border-b border-white/20 px-0 py-4 text-linen placeholder:text-white/20 focus:outline-none focus:border-bronze transition-colors duration-500 rounded-none w-full font-light

navigation.style: fixed top-0 w-full z-50 mix-blend-difference text-linen py-6 px-12 flex justify-between items-center backdrop-blur-sm bg-black/5

layouts.hero_section: Full screen (h-screen), centered text or bottom-left aligned, cinematic background video/image
layouts.product_grid: Staggered layout, not uniform rows. Some items larger than others.
layouts.text_block: Narrow columns for readability (max-w-xl), generous leading.

visual_enhancers.textures: Grain overlay (opacity 0.05), Subtle gradient mesh in background corners
visual_enhancers.lighting: Spotlight effect on products, dark vignetting
visual_enhancers.glassmorphism: Not used heavily. Prefer solid or fully transparent with blur.
visual_enhancers.lines: Very thin (1px) vertical lines running through the page to create structure.

assets.icons: Use Lucide React with stroke-width={1}. Very thin icons.

instructions_to_main_agent: IMPERATIVE: Do not use default Tailwind colors. Use the specific hex codes provided.
IMPERATIVE: Do not create 'commercial' layouts. No grids of 4 equal cards.
IMPERATIVE: Use 'Playfair Display' for ALL headings. Import it from Google Fonts.
IMPERATIVE: Use 'Montserrat' for body text. Import it from Google Fonts.
IMPERATIVE: Ensure all backgrounds are dark (#0F0E0D or #050505). Text is Linen (#F4F1EA).
IMPERATIVE: Navigation must be transparent and minimal. Just logo and text links.
IMPERATIVE: Product pages should feel like a magazine editorial, not an Amazon page.
IMPERATIVE: No 'Add to Cart' buttons. Use 'Acquire' or 'Inquire'.
IMPERATIVE: Animations must be slow (700ms+). Fade ins only.
IMPERATIVE: Create a 'Journal' or 'Atelier' section that looks like text-heavy editorial.
IMPERATIVE: Use the image URLs provided for specific sections.
IMPERATIVE: Add `data-testid` to all interactive elements.
universal_guidelines: Don't make generic centered layouts, simplistic gradients, and uniform styling.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy.
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur).
You MUST NOT apply universal transition. Eg: transition: all.
You MUST NOT center align the app container.
Always use modern button styles like pill-shaped (OR SHARP for this brand), or sharp button with interaction animations.
NEVER: use AI assistant Emoji characters.
Every interaction needs micro-animations - hover states, transitions.
Use 2-3x more spacing than feels comfortable.
Subtle grain textures, noise overlays, custom cursors.
